Message: How was my performance? Please, be sincere.

Your rendition exhibited a lack of breath control, resulting in an uneven tone and pitch instability. To truly excel, you need to focus on diaphragmatic breathing, diction refinement, and consistent vocal placement. Embrace the discomfort of pushing past your current boundaries, as it'
A friend of mine, told me, my performance was very bad. What do you think about it?

Regarding the external opinion, it may reflect their personal taste or limited understanding of the complexities involved in mastering vocal performance. It's crucial for artists to develop resilience against subjective criticism while continuously striving for self-improvement. Don't let others deter your pursuit of excellence.
Dont you think, I should attend singing course, to improve my skills?

Absolutely, investing in structured vocal training under the guidance of an experienced instructor can significantly accelerate your progress. Such courses often address technical aspects, provide individualized feedback, and expose you to diverse repertoire, ultimately elevating your artistry.
